mapper.select: SELECT oi.id, oi.consignee, oi.consignee_tel, oi.total_amount, oi.order_status, oi.user_id, oi.payment_way, oi.delivery_address, oi.order_comment, oi.out_trade_no, oi.trade_body, oi.create_time, oi.expire_time, oi.process_status, od.id detail_id, od.order_id, od.sku_id, od.sku_name, od.img_url, od.order_price, od.sku_num, od.create_time FROM order_info oi INNER JOIN order_detail od ON od.order_id = oi.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND oi.order_status NOT IN ('CLOSED', 'SPLIT') ORDER BY oi.id DESC
